#define INDRID_PORT   ( 16743 )

indri-platform.h

The point of this header is to contain the kinds of things that are stored in platform.h on Unix: * endian constants * type size constants * typedefs

As this is a Indri header, it is also appropriate to put general Indri-specific typedefs here.

Referenced by indri::api::QueryEnvironment::addServer(), and main().
